Claim: "Wind and solar facilities release more carbon dioxide than they save."
Implication: "Coal-fired generators are needed to support wind and solar facilities."
Referring expressions: Wind, solar facilities, carbon dioxide, they.  Coal-fired generators, wind and solar facilities.
Formula: (exists d (exists c (exists b (exists a ((IsReleasedMore(a,b) and SavesMore(c,d)) and ~They(d)))))) -> (exists f (exists e (IsNeeded(e,f) and (IsWind(f) and IsSolar(f)))))
